timeline.bodyText: Why do we need to subtract 1?
timeline.author: vincent-karuri

replies.bodyText:
If we are trying to get the current step number, won't https://github.com/OpenSRP/opensrp-client-native-form/pull/407/files#diff-4af3b3a5f5179b96a2f8051da8ad980ec341e72fc18aa4bd23f0cbc2c2216845L739 suffice?
The current logic assumes that the next step will always be +1 which is not always certain to be true.
